message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm initially offering it to you for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I'm aiming for a higher price, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  I believe this reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not able to go above $10,000 for the product. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $10,000?
